tool_description: Reviews business documents for regulatory compliance, industry standards, and corporate policy adherence with risk assessment.

document_content.description: Complete document content for compliance review

document_category.description: Document category: contract, proposal, report, policy, or communication

risk_tolerance.description: Risk assessment level: low, medium, or high

legal_review_required.description: Whether document requires legal department review

confidentiality_level.description: Document sensitivity: public, internal, confidential, or restricted

data_privacy_check.description: Whether to perform data privacy compliance check

approval_chain.description: Required approval levels for document type

error_messages: Empty document content: Provide document content for compliance review
Invalid industry sector: Provide a recognized industry sector
Invalid document category: Use one of [contract, proposal, report, policy, communication]
Invalid risk tolerance: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid confidentiality level: Use one of [public, internal, confidential, restricted]
Document size exceeded: Maximum document size for compliance review exceeded
usage: Provide document_content, industry_sector, and document_category for basic compliance review. Add regulatory_frameworks, internal_policies, and other parameters for comprehensive assessment.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance assessment: compliant, non_compliant, or requires_review

risk_score.description: Compliance risk score (0-100, higher means more risk)

violations_found.description: List of potential compliance violations identified
